description:
When it comes to staying warm in freezing conditions, you need a sleeping bag that can deliver. By laminating insulation to the shell, this unique construction eliminates cold spots and maximizes the loft of your insulation. Plus, the thermally mapped insulation ensures you get the most warmth where you need it most.

  • Lightweight polyester shell with DWR finish protects your bag from tent wall condensation and makes it easier to keep your bag clean
  • Temperlite™ insulation provides significant weight reduction without compromising warmth or loft
  • Horizontal baffles prevent the insulation from shifting and creating cold spots
  • Zoned insulation maximizes thermal efficiency and weight saving
  • Hood lets you lift and move your head, even when fully zipped up and has a one-handed cinch adjustment
  • Draft collar prevents warm air from escaping
  • Contoured footbox feels natural and roomy
  • Includes a mesh storage bag and a nylon compression sack
name: Mountain Hardwear Lamina -29C Temperlite Sleeping Bag - Unisex
